job.title: Web Developer and Software Engineer - ASP.NET C#
job.description: Are you interested in helping to transform the way people communicate?Multimedia Solutions is a cutting-edge digital consulting firm focused on revolutionizing the way our Fortune 2000 clients reach their clients. As a Website Developer and Software Engineer, your responsibilities will include designing, developing, and maintaining software application components using C# (programming language), ASP.NET, AJAX, Model-View Controller (MVC), JQuery, Web Services, XML, XSD, XSLT, etc.If you embrace a close-knit small business environment and want to have a big impact on the firm, our clients, and your career, please read on. Software Developer BenefitsOpportunity to work on web development projects for Fortune 2000 companiesOpportunity to work on the Multimedia Solutions Digital Experience platform visionWork with the latest programming technologies on websites, mobile computing, content management, and social mediaCompetitive salary with benefits, bonus opportunities, and training. Plus, you get to work with really smart peopleA culture founded on the principles of excellence, respect, accountability, integrity, enjoyment, and diversityThe exciting and ideal work environment of feeling part of a start-up but yet in a company with a solid 28-year reputationHealth and Dental BenefitsH1 Sponsorship401K PlanRequirementsC#.NETASP.NETASP.NET MVCRazorUmbraco CMS or other .NET based CMS exposure JavaScript / AJAX
